tip.aasb.dm.armor.desc.1: Provides enormous amounts of protection by absorbing damage
tip.aasb.dm.armor.desc.2: Protection decreases with more damage absorbed, regenerates over time
tip.aasb.dm.armor.desc.3: Will violently release all stored energy at once if it absorbs to much
tip.aasb.dm.armor.flavor: Become a living fortress with the infalliable Ultrashield
tip.aasb.dm.axe.desc: Press %s to quickly harvest all nearby tree blocks
tip.aasb.dm.axe.flavor: Turn forests into plains with the controversial Supercut
tip.aasb.dm.enchBonus.desc: Gains large boosts to base stats when enchanted
tip.aasb.dm.hoe.flavor: Expedite landscaping with the useful Hyperscythe
tip.aasb.dm.pickaxe.desc: Press %s to instantly collect all nearby ores
tip.aasb.dm.pickaxe.flavor: Make stripmining a breeze with the handy Proximine
tip.aasb.dm.shovel.desc: Press %s to violently excavate a large area
tip.aasb.dm.shovel.flavor: Level entire mountains with the arguably safe Areablast
tip.aasb.dm.sword.desc: Press %s to rapidly attack nearby creatures
tip.aasb.dm.sword.flavor: Decimate your foes with the powerful Autoslash
tip.aasb.dm.tool.enchBonus.flavor: Outclass everything else with the help of enchanting
tip.aasb.dm.tool.staticDig.desc: Dig Stabilizer is avaliable, allowing for precision block breaking
